titleStmt.title: The badger in the fox-trap, or, A Satyr upon satyrs.
titleStmt.author: Dean, J. (John), fl. 1679-1685.

notesStmt.note: A political satire in verse on Shaftesbury.
Attributed to J. Dean. Cf. BM.
Place and date of publication from Wing.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
